member.summary: Occurs when a control is about to be shown. The control is shown when the user clicks on its item.
member.param: TRUE if the control is being requested for the first time; FALSE if it is requested repeatedly.
member.returns: TRUE to cancel the display; FALSE to continue.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Configuration.Forms.Controls.CategoryItemControl.OnHide
member.summary: Occurs when a control is about to be hidden. The control is hidden when the user clicks on another item.
member.returns: TRUE to cancel the dismissal; FALSE to continue.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Configuration.Forms.Controls.CategoryItemControl.Save
member.summary: Occurs when the user dismisses the configuration dialog via OK button and the control is dirty. The control should save its settings now.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Configuration.Forms.Controls.CategoryItemControl.Close
member.summary: Occurs when the user dismisses the configuration dialog via OK or CANCEL button.

member.summary: Marks the control dirty.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the control has an UI to show.

member.name: T:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Infrastructure.DatabaseEventInfo
member.summary: Represents database event information.

member.name: F:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Infrastructure.DatabaseEventInfo.MS_DB_EVENT_GET
member.summary: DB/Event/Get Retrieves all the information stored in hDbEvent wParam=(WPARAM)(HANDLE)hDbEvent lParam=(LPARAM)(DBEVENTINFO*)&dbe hDbEvent should have been returned by db/event/add or db/event/find*event Returns 0 on success or nonzero if hDbEvent is invalid Don't forget to set dbe.cbSize, dbe.pBlob and dbe.cbBlob before calling this service The correct value dbe.cbBlob can be got using db/event/getblobsize If successful, all the fields of dbe are filled. dbe.cbBlob is set to the actual number of bytes retrieved and put in dbe.pBlob If dbe.cbBlob is too small, dbe.pBlob is filled up to the size of dbe.cbBlob and then dbe.cbBlob is set to the required size of data to go in dbe.pBlob On return, dbe.szModule is a pointer to the database module's own internal list of modules. Look but don't touch.

member.name: F:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Infrastructure.DatabaseEventInfo.MS_DB_EVENT_GETCONTACT
member.summary: DB/Event/GetContact Retrieves a handle to the contact that owns hDbEvent. wParam=(WPARAM)(HANDLE)hDbEvent lParam=0 hDbEvent should have been returned by db/event/add or db/event/find*event NULL is a valid return value, meaning, as usual, the user. Returns (HANDLE)(-1) if hDbEvent is invalid, or the handle to the contact on success This service is exceptionally slow. Use only when you have no other choice at all.

member.name: F:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Infrastructure.DatabaseEventInfo.MS_DB_EVENT_GETTEXT
member.summary: DB/Event/GetText (0.7.0+) Retrieves the event's text wParam=(WPARAM)0 (unused) lParam=(LPARAM)(DBEVENTGETTEXT*)egt - pointer to structure with parameters egt->dbei should be the valid database event read via MS_DB_EVENT_GET egt->datatype = DBVT_WCHAR or DBVT_ASCIIZ or DBVT_TCHAR. If a caller wants to suppress Unicode part of event in answer, add DBVTF_DENYUNICODE to this field. egt->codepage is any valid codepage, CP_ACP by default. Function returns a pointer to a string in the required format. This string should be freed by a call of mir_free

member.summary: the protocol is extensible and Supports plugin-defined messages.

member.summary: Changes the protocol's status mode.

member.remarks: Will send an ack when the message actually gets sent type=ACKTYPE_MESSAGE, result=success/failure, lParam=0.

member.name: T:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Forms.Controls.CueBannerTextBox
member.summary: Draws a textbox with a prompt inside of it, similar to the "Quick Search" box in Outlook 2007, IE7 or the Firefox 2.0 search box. The prompt will disappear when the focus is placed in the textbox, and will not display again if the Text property contains any value. If the Text property is empty, then the prompt will display again when the textbox loses the focus.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Forms.Controls.CueBannerTextBox.#ctor
member.summary: Public constructor
member.remarks: Uncomment the SetStyle line to activate the OnPaint logic in place of the WndProc logic

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Forms.Controls.CueBannerTextBox.OnEnter(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When the textbox receives an OnEnter event, select all the text if any text is present

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Forms.Controls.CueBannerTextBox.OnTextAlignChanged(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Redraw the control when the text alignment changes

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Forms.Controls.CueBannerTextBox.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)
member.summary: Redraw the control with the prompt
member.remarks: This event will only fire if ControlStyles.UserPaint is set to true in the constructor

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Forms.Controls.CueBannerTextBox.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)
member.summary: Overrides the default WndProc for the control
member.remarks: This technique is necessary because the OnPaint event seems to be doing some extra processing that I haven't been able to figure out.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Forms.Controls.CueBannerTextBox.DrawTextPrompt
member.summary: Overload to automatically create the Graphics region before drawing the text prompt
member.remarks: The Graphics region is disposed after drawing the prompt.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Forms.Controls.CueBannerTextBox.DrawTextPrompt(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Draws the PromptText in the TextBox.ClientRectangle using the PromptFont and PromptForeColor
member.param: The Graphics region to draw the prompt on

member.name: T:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader
member.summary: Controls managed plugin fusion and orchestrates the runtime.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the runtime.
member.remarks: Called from the exported IL stubs as a first method to initialize the Loader singleton.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes the Loader and prepares its PLUGININFO.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.InitializePluginInfo
member.summary: Publishes the plugin info and marshals it into a ptr.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.PopulatePluginInfo(Virtuoso.Hyphen.Native.PLUGININFO)
member.summary: Populates the plugin info with Hyphen's identity.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.GetInstance(System.Version)
member.summary: Gets a specified version of the Loader.
member.param: A version of the Loader to be returned.
member.returns: An instance of the Loader or NULL when the version cannot be satisfied.
member.remarks: Cannot be inlined because of the HyphenVersion property which relies on the Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly() method.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.GetInstance
member.summary: Gets an instance of the Loader.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.MirandaPluginInfo(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Represents the MirandaPluginInfo export of Miranda's API.
member.returns: Ptr to an instance of the PLUGININFO structure.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.MirandaPluginInfoEx(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Represents the MirandaPluginInfoEx export of Miranda's API.
member.returns: Ptr to an instance of the PLUGININFOEX structure.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.GetDummyPluginInfo
member.summary: Gets the pointer to a dummy plugin info structure.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.MirandaPluginInfoShared(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Performs initialization steps common to all MirandaPluginInfo exports.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.MirandaPluginInterfaces
member.summary: Represents the MirandaPluginInterfaces export of Miranda's API.
member.returns: Ptr to an array of interface GUIDs.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.ModuleInducedLoad(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Called by a standalone module to ensure the Loader is ready (the module could be loaded before Hyphen).
member.param: Ptr to an instance of the PLUGINLINK structure.
member.remarks: Calls the to ensure that the Loader is ready. This method is needed to handle a situation when a standalone module is loaded before Hyphen. Does nothing when Hyphen is already loaded.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.Load(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Represents the Load export of Miranda API. Loads Hyphen and initializes the runtime.
member.param: Ptr to an instance of the PLUGINLINK structure.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.InitializeRuntimeContext(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Initializes the runtime context (including configuration).
member.param: Ptr to PLUGINLINK to initialize from.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.HookRuntimeEvents
member.summary: Hooks to the ModulesLoaded event to complete context initialization.

member.summary: Completes the runtime initialization and fires the ModulesLoaded event.

member.summary: Registers Hyphen for updates via Updater.

member.summary: Initializes the FileSystemWatcher to watch for plugin changes.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.InitializeMenu
member.summary: Populates Miranda's menu with Hyphen's items and initializes managed menu for plugins.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.InitializeManagedMenu
member.summary: Initializes the managed menu for managed plugins. This menu, unlike Miranda's, supports item removal.

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.Unload
member.summary: Represents the Unload export of Miranda API. Unloads Hyphen and shuts down the runtime.
member.remarks: Called by the UnloadOnShutdownService to unload managed plugins before Miranda does. Managed plugins SHOULD NOT be unloaded when Miranda's unloading, because I do not consider it safe (i.e. heap corruption is likely to occur).

member.name: M:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.PerformFullUnload
member.summary: Unloads Hyphen completelly.

member.summary: Disposes the plugin's folder watcher (if needed).

member.summary: Disposes the Tray manager (if needed).

member.summary: Broadcasts the BeforeShutdown event to the managed plugins and unloads Hyphen on Miranda's shutdown.

member.name: P:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.PluginsLoaded
member.summary: Gets a value whether the plugins are loaded. Not synchronized, always use in a lock.
member.remarks: THIS MUST NOT BE SYNCHRONIZED, ALWAYS CALLED IN LOCK! (possible deadlock in FusionProgressDialog).

member.name: P:Virtuoso.Hyphen.Loader.PluginInfo
member.summary: Gets Hyphen plugin info.

member.name: F:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Infrastructure.Protocols.AckRouter.MS_PROTO_CHAINSEND
member.summary: Call the next service in the chain for this send operation. wParam=wParam lParam=lParam The return value should be returned immediately wParam and lParam should be passed as the parameters that your service was called with. wParam must remain untouched but lParam is a CCSDATA structure that can be copied and modified if needed. Typically, the last line of any chaining protocol function is return CallService(MS_PROTO_CHAINSEND,wParam,lParam);

member.name: F:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Infrastructure.Protocols.AckRouter.MS_PROTO_CHAINRECV
member.summary: Call the next service in the chain for this receive operation wParam=wParam lParam=lParam The return value should be returned immediately wParam and lParam should be passed as the parameters that your service was called with. wParam must remain untouched but lParam is a CCSDATA structure that can be copied and modified if needed. When being initiated by the network-access protocol module, wParam should be zero. Thread safety: ms_proto_chainrecv is completely thread safe since 0.1.2.0 Calls to it are translated to the main thread and passed on from there. The function will not return until all callees have returned, irrepective of differences between threads the functions are in.

member.name: T:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Infrastructure.Skin
member.summary: Manages Miranda skin entities, for example icons and sounds.

member.name: T:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Resources.VisualResources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Resources.VisualResources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Virtuoso.Miranda.Plugins.Resources.VisualResources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
